changelog: Fixed Rt.115 beach, Rt.118 Fisherman, Slateport Devon Goods logic
Changed require flash/itemfinder checks to show as obtainable out of logic (yellow) when applicable
Fixed clearing events on AP connect? again?
Updated events tracking again
!!Compatibility is broken again, events will not track on older rando builds!!
Updated more assets
Fixed Meteor Falls access logic with extra boulders enabled
Fixed Pacifidog and Rt. 132-134 access logic
Fixed Norman and E4 settings to allow a requirement of 0
Fixed events not clearing when connecting to AP
Updated events autotracking to work with latest rando commit
!! THIS BREAKS COMPATIBILITY WITH OLD VERSIONS OF THE RANDO !!
Added Steven Gift event
Remade several assets
Progression items are now directly hosted when not randomised
Added pack variant to disable all hosted items
Supports autotracking for events!
- (Ensure you are using an up to date commit of the rando for this)
Remade Free Fly Location assets
Pack now automatically checks for new releases
Wailmer Pail is no more
